nodes.text: Rasit Brun was a senator who represented Rintonne and the Lambda sector prior to the Clone Wars. After Kendra Tissido was attacked by a frigate and five droid starfighters in Andoan space, Brun stated it was an act of war, and accused the senator of the Trade Federation, Lott Dod, that the company was involved in this incident having supplied the demilitarized Ando with weapons.
